file_content.text: What are you doing in my workshop? Did Grathan let you in?
You! You thought you could take me by surprise, but you can't!
What do you want to bet this ends badly?
Those were my daughter's access codes you used. Whatever you've done to her, I'll have my revenge.
You must be Theovor Mindak. I've heard a lot about you.
Hello, there.
And you must be one of the little sadists from Imperial Intelligence.
Calm down, Theovor. Your daughter is fine.
There's no need for that.
Fine? Imperial Intelligence doesn't leave people "fine."
I understand you're helping the dissident cell plan an attack.
Let's talk about the radicals.
I'm helping to free the people of the Empire from thugs like you!
You people took away my wife--stole her from my house one night and never told me what happened.
My only daughter grew up to be worthless, and now you've taken her from me, too. I despise your kind.
And you're a crazy old terrorist.
Idiot.
I'm a father and a patriot--and you're dead!
We can resolve this peacefully, if you'll just listen to me.
It's okay. Don't get upset.
No. There won't be any peace until the Empire changes its ways.
True enough.
I swear you'll pay.
